summary: This is an email from an FBI forensic accountant requesting the preparation of subpoenas for Chase Bank, UBS Financial Services, MoneyGram, Western Union, and Experian regarding Ghislaine Maxwell. The email includes attached riders for the subpoenas and provides instructions for serving them and returning results.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document is about preparing subpoenas for financial records related to Ghislaine Maxwell as part of an investigation.

events.title: Request for Subpoenas on Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant requests the preparation of subpoenas for multiple financial institutions (Chase, UBS, MoneyGram, Western Union, Experian) regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's records.

keyFacts: Subpoenas were being prepared for Chase Bank, UBS Financial Services, MoneyGram, Western Union, and Experian regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's financial records.
The request was made by an FBI forensic accountant on August 16, 2019.
The document indicates an active financial investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell by the FBI.
Results were to be forwarded to a Special Agent at the FBI New York Field Office.
The email includes attached riders specifically tailored for each financial institution's subpoena.
